entities.name: angel
entities.description: The angel on top of the tree was actually a garden gnome that had bitten Fred on the ankle. It was painted gold, stuffed into a miniature tutu and with small wings glued to its back.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred was pulled up carrots for Christmas dinner when he got bitten by the garden gnome. He is also playing Exploding Snap with Ginny under cover of a song.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is playing Exploding Snap with Ginny under cover of a song.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is playing Exploding Snap with George and Fred under cover of a song.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is shooting Bill and Fleur covert looks, as though hoping to pick something up.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is the target of Ron's covert looks.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is talking loudly in the corner, causing Mrs Weasley to point her wand at the volume control.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is trying to keep Fleur quiet by pointing her wand at the volume control.

entities.name: celestina warbeck
entities.description: Celestina Warbeck is singing on the radio, but Fleur finds her very dull.

relationships.description: The garden gnome bit Fred on the ankle as he pulled up carrots for Christmas dinner.
Ron is shooting Bill covert looks, as though hoping to pick something up.
Ron is also shooting Fleur covert looks, as though hoping to pick something up.
George and Ginny are playing Exploding Snap under cover of a song.
Fred is also playing Exploding Snap with Ginny under cover of a song.
